title: 1 Up USA Adds APS and Camp Table to RackAttach System
content:
1-Up USAâ€˜s RackAttach ($589) is one of the most secure bicycle rack swing outs available on the market and its modularity just got a bump thanks to the APS framework. APS allows you to attach a modular MOLLE panel ($299) to your RackAttach to carry gear like traction boards, propane bottles, shovels, or whatever else you might not want inside your car. Then, you can add a camp table ($149) to the APS for easy camping needs like making coffee or use it as a bike repair surface. The 1-Up USA APS is an expandable system, allowing for an additional side panel ($79) to carry more stuff.

1 Up USA makes its racks, the RackAttach, and APS in the USA. Roll on over to 1 Up see the APS system.

The post 1 Up USA Adds APS and Camp Table to RackAttach System appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
